name: Unreal Tournament 2004 Java interface
short_description: The UT2k4 java interface is built on top of the UnrealGOAL bot envrionment interface designed by K.V. Hindricks [and others. please ref]. This interface takes advantage of the UnrealGOAL envrionment to provide a bot with a base responsive functionality built-in, greatly simplifying the development of high-level BDI oriented plans. The initial design was required to interface with the JACK Agent Oriented programming language, and the Prometheus Design Tool - a graphical design tool for JACK agents that runs as a plugin in Eclipse. However you may write using Java or another language, you just have to implement an interface of ~3 methods.
summary: Interface to allow bot construction in java, built on UnrealGOAL.
